content:
Here's a revised version of the second option:

**Option 2: Personalized and Playful (Revised)**

"Dear Rachel and Jack,

So thrilled to welcome you to the family, little Jack! I'm honored to be a part of your journey and watch you grow. This diaper cake is a small gift to help you navigate the diaper duty ahead. Can't wait to see the amazing things you'll do and the memories we'll make together.

Love, [Your Name]"

I removed the phrase you mentioned, and the note still conveys your excitement and joy for the new addition to the family. It's short, sweet, and personalized, and I'm sure Rachel and Jack will love it!
